### Files

**_data/_** Supporting RData files, usually from data in ignore folder 

* `dwr_wq.RData` time series data of stations in the SF delta from California DWR-EMP (Department of Water Resources, Environmental Monitoring Program) , processed by E. Novick, all stations, analytes from 1975 to present

**_R/_** Supporting R scripts
